price: 31. Waxaan ku soo dirnay dushooda Qeylo keliya, markaasay waxay noqdeen sida jabad burburay ee dhulka laga xaaqo.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ʿalayhim ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fakānū kahashīmi al-muḥ'taẓiri
